So Mildaurion wasn't in the safehold after all.1�
Her whereabouts may still elude us, but I am certain the cardinal lives.1�
Mildaurion must be found and punished for her sins before the whole world ends up like this barren land...1�
Leave it up to me, sis.Once I track down the theologian, Prishe, she'll be able to tell me where the carrrdinal is hiding.1�
Prishe's trrrail leads to the Rhinostery in Windurst.I'll head there rrright now!1�
How did you...!?�
Prishe!?You haven't changed at all...1�
Yeah, I watch my diet.Good to see you're still kicking, too, Miss Tracker.It's been a while.1�
A meeting of old friends?1�
This girl is no friend of mine.She is the youth that manipulated the Tavnazian Cathedral alongside Cardinal Mildaurion!1�
Do not tell me that you've forgotten our warning!1�
When the Wyrmking returns, a new war will erupt between the dragons and Altana's children...1�
Before that happens, we must wake the sleeping gods with the Lay of the Immortals and beseech their aid!1�
Can you not see!?The future that we most feared has come to pass!1�
Of course we Mithran Trackers carry heavy sins of our own...1�
We failed to see through your honeyed words, even going so far as to aid you in your demented plans...1�
Who ever would have believed those plans involved rrresurrecting the Twilight God with the Lay of the Immortals!1�
Now hang on there, furball, aren't you getting your facts mixed up?1�
It's true that Cardinal Mildaurion never really intended to wake up your fusty old gods...1�
But we never did anything to bring back Promathia!1�
Then why does that girl behind you sing the Lay of the Immortals?1�
And we know why the beastmen are collecting the stones known as ��magicite��...the same stone imbedded in your body!1�
And the magicite you possess was the same material used by the beastmen to revive the Shadow Lord!1�
The Shadow Lord...?1�
Don't play coy with us!1�
If you had no intention of awakening the sleeping gods...1�
...why would you need to find a singer for the Lay of the Immortals!?1�
What have you brought forth from the abyss of death with the power of the magicite!?1�
I give up.There's no talking to you guys when you get all fanatical like this.1�
That's why we never told you the truth.1�
Why, you little brrrat!1�
Yes, you're rrright, we are singular in our purpose.If you understand our zeal, then there is nothing left to talk about.1�
We are not here to probe your other sins.We are here to demand payment for a single crime.1�
The crrrime of singing the Lay of the Immortals!1�
You will be held responsible for the sins of Mildaurion!1�
There will be no hearing!Prepare to face your judgment!!!�
Why...?No...strength...left...1�
Some strange power...at work?1�
You guys can't kill us.1�
We've spent a long time dealing with things that people were never meant to encounter.And we're gonna finish what we set out to do.1�
What are you...?1�
I know exactly what you girls are trying to get at.1�
You want to save everyone--save Vana'diel.I know I'm right 'cos I feel that way, too.1�
We thought bringing back Promathia was the only way.1�
Prishe, you never mentioned...!?1�
Mildaurion...!I knew it...!1�
If you want me to pay for that crime, I'm happy to do it.But not for you.1�
Not for the terrestrial avatars, not for the sleeping gods, and definitely not for the beastmen.1�
I'll do it for me.Because my crime was abandoning myself.1�
Now, I want some answers.Where can I find the ��Star of Tavnazia��?1�
The Uleguerand Range...?�
Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�

What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Head Wind(pt.1).Head Wind(pt.2).One Good Deed?(pt.1).One Good Deed?(pt.2).Tango with a Tracker(pt.1).Tango with a Tracker(pt.2).Requiem of Sin(pt.1).Requiem of Sin(pt.2).1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
